name: Huge Steps
description:
Made for Godot Wild Jam #23 with the theme of "Tiny World!" The world doesn't get as tiny as when you're a giant!

You need a break. You set up a wonderful vacation on a secluded island and are about to make the trip... The only problem is you're a giant, and there's an entire city in the way! Be careful and try not to step on anything.

Tools Used: Godot, Aseprite, Audacity

Music: Hall of the Mountain King - Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
